=======================
NEWS for lazr.lifecycle
=======================

1.1 (2009-12-03)
================

- Add IDoNotSnapshot and doNotSnapshot to allow the exclusion of
certain fields.

1.0 (2009-08-31)
================

- Remove build dependencies on bzr and egg_info

- remove sys.path hack in setup.py for __version__

0.1 (2009-03-24)
================

- Initial release
